statements: SELECT * FROM risk_assessment
SELECT assessment_id, date, activity FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 50
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT assessment_id, activity, compliance_report FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score < 50
SELECT assessment_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE activity LIKE '%security%'
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, activity, compliance_report FROM risk_assessment WHERE activity LIKE '%fire%' ORDER BY assessment_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(risk_score) AS Highest_Risk_Score, MIN(risk_score) AS Lowest_Risk_Score FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT assessment_id, activity, compliance_report FROM risk_assessment WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS Average_Risk_Score, COUNT(*) AS Total_Assessments FROM risk_assessment WHERE compliance_report IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Average_Risk_Score DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_text, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM risk_assessments ORDER BY assessment_id DESC, assessment_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assessment_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_text LIKE '%risk%' ORDER BY assessment_id
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_text, assessment_date FROM risk_assessments WHERE assessment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE id=1;
SELECT risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE user_id=2;
SELECT report_date, compliance_status FROM compliance_report WHERE compliance_status='approved';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE user_id=3 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS average_risk_score FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT id, user_id, date, risk_score FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM compliance_report GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_reports DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(date) AS latest_transaction_date FROM cryptocurrency_data GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, account_id, report_date FROM ComplianceReport WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM CryptocurrencyActivity GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT id, account_name FROM Account WHERE account_status='Active' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT account_id, COUNT(*) FROM ComplianceReport GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM Account WHERE account_status = 'active';
SELECT a.id, c.compliance_status, r.risk_score FROM Account a LEFT JOIN ComplianceReport c ON a.id = c.account_id LEFT JOIN RiskAssessment r ON a.id = r.account_id;
SELECT c.activity_type, c.activity_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM CryptocurrencyActivity c WHERE c.activity_type = 'buy' GROUP BY c.activity_type, c.activity_date ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment;
SELECT assessment_date, risk_level FROM risk_assessment WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT report_name, compliance_score FROM compliance_report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_information WHERE client_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT currency_name, transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, risk_level FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'High'
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM client_information ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_report WHERE compliance_score > 80
SELECT currency_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM cryptocurrency_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT user_id, action_performed FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
